table: Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value

context: RESTRICTED STOCK UNITS The following is a summary of RSUs award activity for the years ended December 31, 2019 and 2018: The Company estimates the fair value of the granted shares using the market price of the Company’s stock price at the grant date. For the years ended December 31, 2019, 2018 and 2017, the Company recognized $0.3 million, $0.9 million and $0.6 million, respectively of stock-based compensation expense related to the RSUs. As of December 31, 2019, total compensation cost not yet recognized related to unvested RSUs was approximately $0.8 million, which is expected to be recognized over a weighted-average period of 2.3 years.

questions.15db33e7-74eb-483c-93cb-7cbfe45874c4: What are the respective values of stock-based compensation expense related to the RSUs recognised by the company for the years ended December 31, 2019 and 2018?
questions.d46203bb-930b-4c83-aa68-7a0c9450d21a: What are the respective values of stock-based compensation expense related to the RSUs recognised by the company for the years ended December 31, 2018 and 2017?
questions.a8fbc037-3854-45bc-814f-1afb1e40f527: What is the  total compensation cost not yet recognized related to unvested RSUs as of December 31, 2019?
questions.eb86d5f5-d1b0-4761-ae4c-417b8775ce5b: What is the change in the number of shares granted between 2018 and 2019?
questions.8c47c1a7-0fea-4501-a9f3-8c2b3b5989b1: What is the average shares vested between 2018 and 2019?
questions.0a12160d-f72a-44ec-9c31-5815d81268a0: What is the total stock-based compensation expense related to the RSUs recognised by the company between 2017 to 2019?
